physical_form.properties: Chemically inert, high transparency, recyclable, rigid
physical_form.application: Primary packaging; bottles for containing the Feni
Alternative primary packaging; bottles for containing the Feni, especially for larger sizes or markets where glass is less practical.
Liner for bottle caps to provide a better seal.
Secondary packaging; shipping boxes to protect bottles during transport.
Tertiary packaging; for labels and outer cartons.

physical_form.properties: Impermeable to light and oxygen, malleable
physical_form.application: Seal for bottle caps to ensure freshness and prevent leakage.
Caps, closures, and occasionally for bottles (though less common than PET or glass).
Protective inserts within shipping boxes for added impact resistance.
Alternative to EPS for eco-conscious packaging and void fill.

fragility.application: Wrapping individual bottles for added protection during shipping.
Specifically designed inserts for shipping boxes to hold bottles securely and prevent movement.
Used within shipping boxes to keep bottles from colliding with each other.
Wrapping pallets of packaged Feni for secure transport.

fragility.properties: Reinforces edges of pallets and boxes
fragility.application: Prevents damage to edges during handling and shipping.
Void fill in shipping boxes, providing customized protection.
Protective inserts or clamshell packaging, eco-friendly option.

fragility.properties: Film suspension, cushions product in air
fragility.application: High-value or extremely fragile items to absorb shocks.
Protective layers or inserts for added strength and shock absorption.

shelf_life.application: Primary packaging; extends shelf life by preventing light degradation of the Feni.
Applied to PET bottles to protect the Feni from light degradation.
Caps and closures that create a vacuum seal to minimize oxidation.
Not directly applicable to bottled spirits but could be used for smaller sample sizes in pouches.
Liners in caps or as part of laminated packaging to reduce permeation.
Not typically used in liquid spirits, but relevant for any included dry ingredients or promotional items.
In caps or closures to ensure minimal oxygen exposure.
Layer in multi-layer packaging for reduced gas permeation.
Labels and outer packaging to enhance shelf life.

shelf_life.properties: Prevents air and contaminants from entering
shelf_life.application: Ensuring the bottle is properly sealed to extend shelf life.

chemical_properties.application: Ideal primary packaging to avoid contamination of the Feni.

chemical_properties.properties: Reduces oxygen permeation, minimizes oxidation of contents
chemical_properties.application: PET bottles incorporating oxygen scavenging additives.
Lining for bottle caps to ensure no reaction with the Feni.
Caps and closures made from food-grade HDPE.
Used in dispensing mechanisms or promotional items.
Lining for metal caps to prevent corrosion and interaction with the contents.

chemical_properties.properties: Low reactivity, suitable for food contact
Inert, flexible, resistant to high temperatures

chemical_properties.application: Coatings for closures to prevent interaction with the alcohol.

hygiene_sensitivity.application: Primary packaging; must be sterile before filling to prevent contamination.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Shows evidence of opening, prevents contamination
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Ensuring the bottle has not been opened before purchase.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Provides a barrier against dust and contaminants
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Sealing the bottle and cap together for hygiene and tamper evidence.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Manufactured in a controlled environment to minimize contaminants
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Ensuring closures are free from pathogens.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Inhibits microbial growth on the label surface
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Reducing the risk of contamination from handling.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Safe for use on food contact surfaces
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Used to clean bottles and packaging components before filling.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Can withstand high temperatures and pressures
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Reusable bottles and components that require frequent sterilization.
Maintaining the sterility of the product throughout the packaging process.

temperature_sensitivity.application: Protects Feni from extreme temperature fluctuations during transport.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Indicates if the product has been exposed to unacceptable temperatures
temperature_sensitivity.application: Alerting handlers to potential temperature damage.
Ensuring the bottle doesn't crack due to temperature changes.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Absorbs or releases heat to maintain a constant temperature
temperature_sensitivity.application: Used in shipping containers for temperature regulation.
Used in packaging to minimize heat transfer.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Meets standards for transporting hazardous materials
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Ensuring compliance with shipping regulations for alcohol content.
Used within packaging to contain any leakage during transport.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Indicates if the product has been opened or compromised
Clearly indicates the hazardous nature of the contents
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Alerting handlers to the flammability risk.
Preventing bursting due to temperature changes.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Encloses the primary container to contain leaks
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Adding an extra layer of protection against spills.
Reducing the risk of ignition in a flammable environment.
Using flame-retardant materials in packaging components.
Grounding pallets and containers during handling.

visibility_and_display.application: Allows consumers to see the color and clarity of the Feni.
Creating a premium look and feel.
Ensuring clear and attractive branding and product information.
Providing maximum branding space and visual impact.
Enhancing visual appeal and perceived value.
Creating a clean and modern appearance.
Adding a unique and secure element to the packaging.
Differentiating the product on the shelf.
Used in displays to draw attention.
Linking to recipes, stories, and promotional content.

quantity_and_dosage.application: Convenient for on-the-go consumption or sampling.
Allowing consumers to try the product before buying a full-size bottle.
Suitable for concentrates or small quantities.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: Easy to use, dispenses consistent amounts
quantity_and_dosage.application: For larger bottles or bar settings.
Ensuring accurate dispensing for strong dosages.
Perfect for sampling or managing intake.
Helps consumers manage alcohol intake accurately.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Leaves a VOID message if removed
value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: Deters tampering and provides evidence of theft.
Enabling tracking throughout the supply chain.
Tracking individual products and preventing counterfeiting.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Seals the cap and bottle, shows if opened
Visible under UV light, hard to counterfeit
value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: Adding a covert security feature to the label.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Difficult to replicate, adds visual security

value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: Tracking shipments and preventing theft during transport.
Protecting very high-value products during transport.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Detection tags trigger alarms at exits
